title: Coordinate Event Logistics with Client
description: An event manager is holding a final planning meeting with a client for their upcoming wedding reception.

tasks.description: Finalize the room layout, including table arrangement and dance floor location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the event's floor plan in the planning software.

tasks.description: Confirm the final guest count and update the catering order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the final guest count and sends the revised order to the catering partner.

tasks.description: Create a detailed event timeline, including vendor arrival times, start time, and end time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and shares a comprehensive timeline with the client and all vendors.
